title: EWDP Study
review: Data Collection Agreement for ehive Facilitated Research Studies
Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai

ehive (hosted by Mount Sinai Hospital System, NYC) is a digital platform delivered through a mobile application. It is designed to help collect, administer, and deliver information obtained as part of clinical research studies.
The data from your linked wearable device(s) will be collected through the ehive app.

The data will be made available, in a de-identified format, to a research team and other authorized individuals affiliated with the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai (“Mount Sinai”). Mount Sinai will process such data for the purpose of conducting this research study.
We have applied suitable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards in order to protect your information from illegal access, use or sharing.
By signing this page with your Participant ID, you consent to the processing of your wearable data through the ehive app. The ehive team will send data back to the primary research team for analysis.
